content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":263332,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t上記暴走状態になった次のターン、まだ　我を忘れて怒りで攻撃してくる健太郎","translatedEnglishLine":"The next turn after the above berserk state, Kentaro still attacks in anger, forgetting himself."},{"lineNumber":263333,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tちくしょー美樹ちゃんを　ぶんぶんと剣をふりまわす。","translatedEnglishLine":"Damn it, swinging his sword wildly at Miki-chan."},{"lineNumber":263334,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t誰かが説明しようとするが聞かない","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone tries to explain, but he doesn't listen."},{"lineNumber":263335,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t　私達は魔王美樹を保護しにやったきたのでとか言っても駄目","translatedEnglishLine":"Even saying 'We came to protect Demon King Miki' is no good."},{"lineNumber":263336,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tどうすんだよ、こいつ。","translatedEnglishLine":"What are we going to do about him?"},{"lineNumber":263337,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tうざいから、さっさと始末しよう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Since he's annoying, let's finish him off quickly."},{"lineNumber":263338,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人健太郎を倒します","translatedEnglishLine":"Defeat the demon Kentaro."},{"lineNumber":263339,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tさきほどの美女は見つからない","translatedEnglishLine":"The beautiful woman from earlier cannot be found."},{"lineNumber":263340,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t聖刀日光、カオス","translatedEnglishLine":"Holy Sword Nikkou, Chaos."},{"lineNumber":263341,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\t魔人健太郎を殺す","translatedEnglishLine":"Kill the demon Kentaro."},{"lineNumber":263342,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\t暴走した魔王美樹ちゃん","translatedEnglishLine":"Berserk Demon King Miki-chan."},{"lineNumber":263343,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\tみんな殺されて・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone gets killed..."},{"lineNumber":263344,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t健太郎は殺さずに助ける","translatedEnglishLine":"Save Kentaro without killing him."},{"lineNumber":263345,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t二人に世界の現状を説明して保護する","translatedEnglishLine":"Explain the current state of the world to the two and protect them."},{"lineNumber":263346,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス城に帰宅","translatedEnglishLine":"Return home to Rance Castle."},{"lineNumber":263347,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tまだ不安そうな二人","translatedEnglishLine":"The two still look uneasy."},{"lineNumber":263348,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tごはん食べたら元気になった二人","translatedEnglishLine":"After eating, the two became lively."},{"lineNumber":263349,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t美樹はシィルにごめんなさいをする","translatedEnglishLine":"Miki apologizes to Shīru."},{"lineNumber":263350,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tサテラが美樹に魔王になって欲しいというが断られる","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera wants Miki to become the Demon King, but she refuses."},{"lineNumber":263351,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスは健太郎と話","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance talks with Kentaro."},{"lineNumber":263352,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t心の中で、美樹を必ず犯すと決意","translatedEnglishLine":"Internally, he resolves to definitely violate Miki."},{"lineNumber":263353,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tカオス、カフェ、日光の同窓会","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos, Cafe, and Nikkou's reunion."},{"lineNumber":263354,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle."},{"lineNumber":263355,"originalJapaneseLine":"美樹、ミラクル、健太郎、ピグ","translatedEnglishLine":"Miki, Miracle, Kentaro, Pigu."},{"lineNumber":263356,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔王美樹はランス城に住むようになった、専用の部屋が与えられている","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon King Miki started living in Rance Castle and was given a private room."},{"lineNumber":263357,"originalJapaneseLine":"健太郎はランスに部屋がもらえず、城の外に住めと言われたが、美樹が寂しがるので","translatedEnglishLine":"Kentaro was not given a room in Rance Castle and was told to live outside, but since Miki felt lonely,"},{"lineNumber":263358,"originalJapaneseLine":"美樹の部屋のドアの前で座って過ごしている。夜は寝ずの番している感じ","translatedEnglishLine":"He spends his time sitting by Miki's room door. It feels like he's staying up to keep watch at night."},{"lineNumber":263359,"originalJapaneseLine":"美樹が部屋で一緒に寝ようよと、ベットに一緒にはなんだけど、せめてソファとか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Miki says, 'Let's sleep together in the room,' although not in the same bed, at least on the sofa or something..."},{"lineNumber":263360,"originalJapaneseLine":"駄目だよ、王様が結婚してない男女が夜同じ部屋で寝るなど不謹慎な事をしたら天罰が下ると","translatedEnglishLine":"No good, the king says it's sacrilegious for unmarried men and women to sleep in the same room at night, or divine punishment will descend."},{"lineNumber":263361,"originalJapaneseLine":"言うし・・その、ほら、今もメイドさんが監視している。","translatedEnglishLine":"He says so... and, well, you see, even now the maid is watching."},{"lineNumber":263362,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":263363,"originalJapaneseLine":"ミラクルが魔王に強い関心を持つ","translatedEnglishLine":"Miracle takes a strong interest in the Demon King."},{"lineNumber":263364,"originalJapaneseLine":"いずれは帝王として世界を支配する","translatedEnglishLine":"Eventually, she will rule the world as an emperor."},{"lineNumber":263365,"originalJapaneseLine":"人類帝国の障害になる物を排除するのが帝王の勤めだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"It is the emperor's duty to eliminate anything that stands in the way of the Human Empire."},{"lineNumber":263366,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔王か・・覚醒しておらねば普通の女の子だな","translatedEnglishLine":"A Demon King, huh... if not awakened, just an ordinary girl."},{"lineNumber":263367,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、一度覚醒すると世界を滅ぼす邪悪な魔王となるか","translatedEnglishLine":"However, once awakened, she could become an evil Demon King who destroys the world."},{"lineNumber":263368,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヒラミレモンを食べる事で防いでいるんだな、なるほど、在庫は十分なようだな","translatedEnglishLine":"She's preventing it by eating Hira-mi lemons, I see, and it seems the supply is sufficient."},{"lineNumber":263369,"originalJapaneseLine":"異界から来たのか、私は異界ゲートを開く事が出来るぞ。だが異界は無数にあり","translatedEnglishLine":"Did you come from another world? I can open gates to other worlds. But there are countless other worlds."},{"lineNumber":263370,"originalJapaneseLine":"目的の異界に行くのはほとんど不可能だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's nearly impossible to go to the specific other world you want."},{"lineNumber":263371,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちなみにお主達の世界はどんなのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"By the way, what kind of world is yours?"},{"lineNumber":263372,"originalJapaneseLine":"美樹と健太郎が説明　　文明がここより発達していて、車とか飛行機があるの、魔法じゃ無くて","translatedEnglishLine":"Miki and Kentaro explain: The civilization is more advanced than here, with cars and airplanes, not magic."},{"lineNumber":263373,"originalJapaneseLine":"電気の力でいろいろな物が動いて、あっ・・魔法とか全然ないし、モンスターも居ない","translatedEnglishLine":"Various things move by electricity, oh... there's no magic at all, and no monsters either."},{"lineNumber":263374,"originalJapaneseLine":"まさか・・　もしや、ミラクルがノートを持ち出して調べながら言う","translatedEnglishLine":"No way... Could it be? Miracle says while taking out a notebook and looking things up."},{"lineNumber":263375,"originalJapaneseLine":"　阪神　　新幹線　　神戸　　伊丹空港　　自衛隊","translatedEnglishLine":"Hanshin, Shinkansen, Kobe, Itami Airport, Self-Defense Forces."},{"lineNumber":263376,"originalJapaneseLine":"こういう単語を知っているか","translatedEnglishLine":"Do you know these words?"},{"lineNumber":263377,"originalJapaneseLine":"えっ、どうしてそれを、大阪、大阪、日本だよ　ミラクルさん","translatedEnglishLine":"Eh, how do you know that? Osaka, Osaka, Japan, Miracle-san."},{"lineNumber":263378,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、なんでもない、知らぬぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"No, it's nothing, I don't know."},{"lineNumber":263379,"originalJapaneseLine":"帰りたがっている美樹","translatedEnglishLine":"Miki wants to go back."},{"lineNumber":263380,"originalJapaneseLine":"（まさか、魔王が来たのは　あの恐ろしいスチールホラーなのか・・・）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Could it be that the Demon King came because of that terrifying Steel Horror...)"},{"lineNumber":263381,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔剣カオスと聖刀日光が剣同士で会話","translatedEnglishLine":"The magic sword Chaos and holy sword Nikkou talk to each other sword-to-sword."},{"lineNumber":263382,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔王を殺す、殺させないなど","translatedEnglishLine":"About killing the Demon King or preventing her death and such."},{"lineNumber":263383,"originalJapaneseLine":"冒険中に美人に出会う、聖刀日光という事が分かる","translatedEnglishLine":"Encounter a beauty during the adventure, learn that she is Holy Sword Nikkou."},{"lineNumber":263384,"originalJapaneseLine":"後日、ランス城で日光に迫りセックスする","translatedEnglishLine":"Later, at Rance Castle, he approaches Nikkou and has sex with her."},{"lineNumber":263385,"originalJapaneseLine":"美樹が近くにいるから大人しくしないとばれちゃうぞとか言いながら","translatedEnglishLine":"Saying things like, 'Since Miki is nearby, we have to be quiet or she'll find out.'"},{"lineNumber":263386,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが日光を使えるようになったが、カオスと両刀で遊んでいると","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance has come to be able to use Nikkou, but when playing with both Nikkou and Chaos,"},{"lineNumber":263387,"originalJapaneseLine":"私は真面目に魔人を倒す為になったのですと怒られる","translatedEnglishLine":"He gets scolded, 'I became like this seriously to defeat demons.'"},{"lineNumber":263388,"originalJapaneseLine":"＜ＣＧ：日光のエロ＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<CG: Erotic scene of Nikkou>"},{"lineNumber":263389,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tカオス、カフェ、日光が居る時","translatedEnglishLine":"When Chaos, Cafe, and Nikkou are present."},{"lineNumber":263390,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t過去のエターナルヒーローの物語","translatedEnglishLine":"The story of the past Eternal Hero."},{"lineNumber":263391,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tコンクリ男に会いに行き、剣を取る","translatedEnglishLine":"Go meet the Concrete Man and take his sword."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上記暴走状態になった次のターン、まだ　我を忘れて怒りで攻撃してくる健太郎
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next turn after the above berserk state, Kentaro still attacks in anger, forgetting himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちくしょー美樹ちゃんを　ぶんぶんと剣をふりまわす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn it, swinging his sword wildly at Miki-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが説明しようとするが聞かない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone tries to explain, but he doesn't listen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達は魔王美樹を保護しにやったきたのでとか言っても駄目
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even saying 'We came to protect Demon King Miki' is no good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうすんだよ、こいつ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are we going to do about him?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うざいから、さっさと始末しよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since he's annoying, let's finish him off quickly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人健太郎を倒します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeat the demon Kentaro.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さきほどの美女は見つからない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The beautiful woman from earlier cannot be found.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聖刀日光、カオス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Holy Sword Nikkou, Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人健太郎を殺す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kill the demon Kentaro.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 暴走した魔王美樹ちゃん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Berserk Demon King Miki-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな殺されて・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone gets killed...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎は殺さずに助ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Save Kentaro without killing him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人に世界の現状を説明して保護する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explain the current state of the world to the two and protect them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城に帰宅
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Return home to Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ不安そうな二人
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two still look uneasy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ごはん食べたら元気になった二人
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After eating, the two became lively.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹はシィルにごめんなさいをする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki apologizes to Shīru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラが美樹に魔王になって欲しいというが断られる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera wants Miki to become the Demon King, but she refuses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは健太郎と話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance talks with Kentaro.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心の中で、美樹を必ず犯すと決意
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Internally, he resolves to definitely violate Miki.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス、カフェ、日光の同窓会
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos, Cafe, and Nikkou's reunion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹、ミラクル、健太郎、ピグ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki, Miracle, Kentaro, Pigu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王美樹はランス城に住むようになった、専用の部屋が与えられている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon King Miki started living in Rance Castle and was given a private room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎はランスに部屋がもらえず、城の外に住めと言われたが、美樹が寂しがるので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentaro was not given a room in Rance Castle and was told to live outside, but since Miki felt lonely,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹の部屋のドアの前で座って過ごしている。夜は寝ずの番している感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He spends his time sitting by Miki's room door. It feels like he's staying up to keep watch at night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹が部屋で一緒に寝ようよと、ベットに一緒にはなんだけど、せめてソファとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki says, 'Let's sleep together in the room,' although not in the same bed, at least on the sofa or something...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 駄目だよ、王様が結婚してない男女が夜同じ部屋で寝るなど不謹慎な事をしたら天罰が下ると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No good, the king says it's sacrilegious for unmarried men and women to sleep in the same room at night, or divine punishment will descend.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言うし・・その、ほら、今もメイドさんが監視している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He says so... and, well, you see, even now the maid is watching.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクルが魔王に強い関心を持つ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miracle takes a strong interest in the Demon King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いずれは帝王として世界を支配する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eventually, she will rule the world as an emperor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類帝国の障害になる物を排除するのが帝王の勤めだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is the emperor's duty to eliminate anything that stands in the way of the Human Empire.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王か・・覚醒しておらねば普通の女の子だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A Demon King, huh... if not awakened, just an ordinary girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、一度覚醒すると世界を滅ぼす邪悪な魔王となるか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, once awakened, she could become an evil Demon King who destroys the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒラミレモンを食べる事で防いでいるんだな、なるほど、在庫は十分なようだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's preventing it by eating Hira-mi lemons, I see, and it seems the supply is sufficient.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 異界から来たのか、私は異界ゲートを開く事が出来るぞ。だが異界は無数にあり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did you come from another world? I can open gates to other worlds. But there are countless other worlds.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目的の異界に行くのはほとんど不可能だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's nearly impossible to go to the specific other world you want.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちなみにお主達の世界はどんなのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, what kind of world is yours?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹と健太郎が説明　　文明がここより発達していて、車とか飛行機があるの、魔法じゃ無くて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki and Kentaro explain: The civilization is more advanced than here, with cars and airplanes, not magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 電気の力でいろいろな物が動いて、あっ・・魔法とか全然ないし、モンスターも居ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Various things move by electricity, oh... there's no magic at all, and no monsters either.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか・・　もしや、ミラクルがノートを持ち出して調べながら言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way... Could it be? Miracle says while taking out a notebook and looking things up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 阪神　　新幹線　　神戸　　伊丹空港　　自衛隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hanshin, Shinkansen, Kobe, Itami Airport, Self-Defense Forces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こういう単語を知っているか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do you know these words?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ、どうしてそれを、大阪、大阪、日本だよ　ミラクルさん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh, how do you know that? Osaka, Osaka, Japan, Miracle-san.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、なんでもない、知らぬぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it's nothing, I don't know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 帰りたがっている美樹
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki wants to go back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （まさか、魔王が来たのは　あの恐ろしいスチールホラーなのか・・・）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Could it be that the Demon King came because of that terrifying Steel Horror...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔剣カオスと聖刀日光が剣同士で会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The magic sword Chaos and holy sword Nikkou talk to each other sword-to-sword.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王を殺す、殺させないなど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About killing the Demon King or preventing her death and such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 冒険中に美人に出会う、聖刀日光という事が分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Encounter a beauty during the adventure, learn that she is Holy Sword Nikkou.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後日、ランス城で日光に迫りセックスする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Later, at Rance Castle, he approaches Nikkou and has sex with her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹が近くにいるから大人しくしないとばれちゃうぞとか言いながら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saying things like, 'Since Miki is nearby, we have to be quiet or she'll find out.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが日光を使えるようになったが、カオスと両刀で遊んでいると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance has come to be able to use Nikkou, but when playing with both Nikkou and Chaos,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は真面目に魔人を倒す為になったのですと怒られる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He gets scolded, 'I became like this seriously to defeat demons.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ＣＧ：日光のエロ＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <CG: Erotic scene of Nikkou>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス、カフェ、日光が居る時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Chaos, Cafe, and Nikkou are present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 過去のエターナルヒーローの物語
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The story of the past Eternal Hero.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンクリ男に会いに行き、剣を取る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Go meet the Concrete Man and take his sword.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上記暴走状態になった次のターン、まだ　我を忘れて怒りで攻撃してくる健太郎
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next turn after the above berserk state, Kentaro still attacks in anger, forgetting himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちくしょー美樹ちゃんを　ぶんぶんと剣をふりまわす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn it, swinging his sword wildly at Miki-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが説明しようとするが聞かない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone tries to explain, but he doesn't listen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達は魔王美樹を保護しにやったきたのでとか言っても駄目
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even saying 'We came to protect Demon King Miki' is no good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうすんだよ、こいつ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are we going to do about him?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うざいから、さっさと始末しよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since he's annoying, let's finish him off quickly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人健太郎を倒します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeat the demon Kentaro.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さきほどの美女は見つからない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The beautiful woman from earlier cannot be found.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聖刀日光、カオス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Holy Sword Nikkou, Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人健太郎を殺す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kill the demon Kentaro.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 暴走した魔王美樹ちゃん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Berserk Demon King Miki-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな殺されて・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone gets killed...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎は殺さずに助ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Save Kentaro without killing him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人に世界の現状を説明して保護する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explain the current state of the world to the two and protect them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城に帰宅
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Return home to Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ不安そうな二人
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two still look uneasy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ごはん食べたら元気になった二人
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After eating, the two became lively.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹はシィルにごめんなさいをする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki apologizes to Shīru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラが美樹に魔王になって欲しいというが断られる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera wants Miki to become the Demon King, but she refuses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは健太郎と話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance talks with Kentaro.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心の中で、美樹を必ず犯すと決意
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Internally, he resolves to definitely violate Miki.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス、カフェ、日光の同窓会
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos, Cafe, and Nikkou's reunion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹、ミラクル、健太郎、ピグ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki, Miracle, Kentaro, Pigu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王美樹はランス城に住むようになった、専用の部屋が与えられている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon King Miki started living in Rance Castle and was given a private room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎はランスに部屋がもらえず、城の外に住めと言われたが、美樹が寂しがるので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentaro was not given a room in Rance Castle and was told to live outside, but since Miki felt lonely,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹の部屋のドアの前で座って過ごしている。夜は寝ずの番している感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He spends his time sitting by Miki's room door. It feels like he's staying up to keep watch at night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹が部屋で一緒に寝ようよと、ベットに一緒にはなんだけど、せめてソファとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki says, 'Let's sleep together in the room,' although not in the same bed, at least on the sofa or something...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 駄目だよ、王様が結婚してない男女が夜同じ部屋で寝るなど不謹慎な事をしたら天罰が下ると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No good, the king says it's sacrilegious for unmarried men and women to sleep in the same room at night, or divine punishment will descend.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言うし・・その、ほら、今もメイドさんが監視している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He says so... and, well, you see, even now the maid is watching.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクルが魔王に強い関心を持つ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miracle takes a strong interest in the Demon King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いずれは帝王として世界を支配する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eventually, she will rule the world as an emperor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類帝国の障害になる物を排除するのが帝王の勤めだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is the emperor's duty to eliminate anything that stands in the way of the Human Empire.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王か・・覚醒しておらねば普通の女の子だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A Demon King, huh... if not awakened, just an ordinary girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、一度覚醒すると世界を滅ぼす邪悪な魔王となるか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, once awakened, she could become an evil Demon King who destroys the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒラミレモンを食べる事で防いでいるんだな、なるほど、在庫は十分なようだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's preventing it by eating Hira-mi lemons, I see, and it seems the supply is sufficient.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 異界から来たのか、私は異界ゲートを開く事が出来るぞ。だが異界は無数にあり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did you come from another world? I can open gates to other worlds. But there are countless other worlds.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目的の異界に行くのはほとんど不可能だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's nearly impossible to go to the specific other world you want.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちなみにお主達の世界はどんなのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, what kind of world is yours?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹と健太郎が説明　　文明がここより発達していて、車とか飛行機があるの、魔法じゃ無くて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki and Kentaro explain: The civilization is more advanced than here, with cars and airplanes, not magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 電気の力でいろいろな物が動いて、あっ・・魔法とか全然ないし、モンスターも居ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Various things move by electricity, oh... there's no magic at all, and no monsters either.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか・・　もしや、ミラクルがノートを持ち出して調べながら言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way... Could it be? Miracle says while taking out a notebook and looking things up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 阪神　　新幹線　　神戸　　伊丹空港　　自衛隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hanshin, Shinkansen, Kobe, Itami Airport, Self-Defense Forces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こういう単語を知っているか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do you know these words?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ、どうしてそれを、大阪、大阪、日本だよ　ミラクルさん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh, how do you know that? Osaka, Osaka, Japan, Miracle-san.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、なんでもない、知らぬぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it's nothing, I don't know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 帰りたがっている美樹
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki wants to go back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （まさか、魔王が来たのは　あの恐ろしいスチールホラーなのか・・・）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Could it be that the Demon King came because of that terrifying Steel Horror...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔剣カオスと聖刀日光が剣同士で会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The magic sword Chaos and holy sword Nikkou talk to each other sword-to-sword.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王を殺す、殺させないなど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About killing the Demon King or preventing her death and such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 冒険中に美人に出会う、聖刀日光という事が分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Encounter a beauty during the adventure, learn that she is Holy Sword Nikkou.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後日、ランス城で日光に迫りセックスする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Later, at Rance Castle, he approaches Nikkou and has sex with her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹が近くにいるから大人しくしないとばれちゃうぞとか言いながら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saying things like, 'Since Miki is nearby, we have to be quiet or she'll find out.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが日光を使えるようになったが、カオスと両刀で遊んでいると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance has come to be able to use Nikkou, but when playing with both Nikkou and Chaos,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は真面目に魔人を倒す為になったのですと怒られる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He gets scolded, 'I became like this seriously to defeat demons.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ＣＧ：日光のエロ＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <CG: Erotic scene of Nikkou>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス、カフェ、日光が居る時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Chaos, Cafe, and Nikkou are present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 過去のエターナルヒーローの物語
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The story of the past Eternal Hero.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンクリ男に会いに行き、剣を取る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Go meet the Concrete Man and take his sword.
